title: Unmasked: Volume Three
description: The stunning conclusion of the Unmasked Series from New York Times bestselling author Cassia Leo.My entire life has been unmasked. Everything I thought to be true has been called into question. Whom do I trust? What do I believe?With two men promising to keep me safe and one promising to give me my life back, which path do I choose?Masked or unmasked?
author: Cassia Leo
